title: The 21 Most Controversial Golfers
headline: The 21 Most Controversial Golfers
description: Maybe it's an ill-timed tweet or surprising moment of candor. It could be just plain surliness. Whatever the reason, there are certain players who strike a nerve as well as they strike the ball. Here are 21 of the most controversial figures in the game.
